response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am excited to extend this offer. Considering its significance and the benefits it could bring to you, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and my expectations, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please feel free to respond. I look forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 950000}
